sources.title: Backstage
sources.description: Backstage with Fatty Arbuckle, a nice print of a simple little comedy from 1919. Mable Norman costars.

metadata.Plot: An adolescent groupie zeroes in on her Blondie-like idol after the singer chances to cross her orbit on a publicity tour. Gradually their lives intertwine as, with near-operatic intensity, the film delves into the emotional dependency on both sides of celebrity culture.
metadata.Actors: Emmanuelle Seigner, Isild Le Besco, Noémie Lvovsky
